name: 7. Burned the Hatchets.
description:
"We as a family, as all families, have had our share our conflict. I can recall numerous disputes between my Mother and Brother regarding the care of Hatchets and Hammers. To see these out on the ground, wooden handles completely vanished so what remained was a couple of heads in a pile of ash, I wondered if this was a great levelling of some sort. In the wake of destruction the former conflict that lead to these tools being out here in the first place seemed irrelevant. Don't just bury the Hatchets, let them burn."

Photography by Jay Moon, during the Australian wildfires; November 2019.
#7 of 15.
All funds generated go toward the ongoing recovery.
